title: The One Where Monica Gets a Roommate (Pilot)
synopsis: Rachel runs from her wedding and meets the friends in the coffee place. Ross is depressed about his divorce but he still has a crush on Rachel.

title: The One with the Sonogram at the End
synopsis: Ross's lesbian ex-wife is pregnant with his child, and he doesn't like her choice of a last name for the baby.

title: The One with the Thumb
synopsis: A soda company gives Phoebe $7,000 after she finds a dismembered thumb in a can of soda.

title: The One with George Stephanopoulos
synopsis: A deliveryman accidentally brings a pizza meant for George Stephanopoulos, who lives across the street from the girls.

title: The One with the East German Laundry Detergent
synopsis: Ross helps Rachel do laundry and considers the evening a first date. Joey has Monica pose as his new girlfriend.

title: The One with the Butt
synopsis: Joey gets his big film break when he's hired to be Al Pacino's stunt butt.

title: The One with the Blackout
synopsis: During a citywide blackout, Ross tries to tell Rachel that he likes her.

title: The One Where Nana Dies Twice
synopsis: Monica and Ross mourn the death of their grandmother. Chandler questions his sexuality.

title: The One Where Underdog Gets Away
synopsis: Monica's first Thanksgiving dinner for the gang burns when they all run to the rooftop to see the runaway Underdog balloon from the parade.

title: The One with the Monkey
synopsis: The gang makes and then breaks a pact to celebrate New Year's Eve without dates. Lonely Ross gets a roommate: a monkey named Marcel.

title: The One with Mrs. Bing
synopsis: When Chandler's romance novelist mother comes to New York to visit him, Joey catches her and Ross kissing.

title: The One with the Dozen Lasagnas
synopsis: Monica gives Paolo one of the dozen lasagnas she made for her aunt, who doesn't want them anymore because they've got meat in them.

title: The One with the Boobies
synopsis: Chandler accidentally sees Rachel wandering around topless after her shower, so Rachel tries to even the score.

title: The One with the Candy Hearts
synopsis: Joey fixes up Chandler and Janice, and Ross runs into Carol and Susan on a Valentine's Day date.

title: The One with the Stoned Guy
synopsis: Monica cooks a gourmet meal for a restaurateur looking for a new chef, but unfortunately, he's stoned.

title: The One with the Two Parts: Part 1
synopsis: Joey falls for Phoebe's twin sister, making Phoebe feel neglected. Ross attends Lamaze classes with Carol and Susan.

title: The One with the Two Parts: Part 2
synopsis: When Rachel sprains her ankle and has no insurance, she talks Monica into trading identities so she can use Monica's coverage.

title: The One with All the Poker
synopsis: Rachel interviews for a job as an assistant buyer at Saks Fifth Avenue. The women face the men in a not-so-friendly game of poker.

title: The One Where the Monkey Gets Away
synopsis: The gang searches for Marcel, who slipped out of the apartment while Rachel was caring for him.

title: The One with the Evil Orthodontist
synopsis: Rachel and Barry start dating again, even though he's engaged to Mindy, who wants Rachel to be her maid of honor.

title: The One with the Fake Monica
synopsis: When Monica's credit card is stolen, she decides to catch the thief.

title: The One with the Ick Factor
synopsis: After losing his virginity to her, Monica's boyfriend reveals that he's a high school senior. Phoebe temps as Chandler's secretary.

title: The One with the Birth
synopsis: Carol goes into labor while Ross, Phoebe and Susan get locked in a closet.

title: The One Where Rachel Finds Out
synopsis: During Rachel's birthday party, Chandler accidentally lets it slip that Ross is in love with her.
